website_summaries.verdict: A strong and durable product that is designed to prevent injuries and still bring great fun.
pros: Solid, but not so hard it could come back and hurt you
Makes for great fun on the beach
Can be a nice alternative to a body-board
cons: No attachment option for a leash

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooooo much fun
customer_reviews.text: Love this board. I bought it for my 11 yr old. I already own the Wedge and my son used it all of the time so I bought him a Grom. Now we have a frickin' blast body surfing together. We switch boards sometimes and I get great rides on the Grom and I'm not a small guy (weigh about 240 lbs). I grew up body surfing in the Outer Banks of North Carolina and currently live in VA Beach. I'm about to buy another one as a birthday present for a close family friend. You won't regret this purchase - it helps make great beach memories.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Fun to ride, easier to carry than a boogie board.
customer_reviews.text: Took a few tries to figure it out, but loved it!! Rode more waves than anyone on the beach!!! Was able to ride 5 - 1 foot waves. Did great on all of them. Rode wave to shore. If you know how to body surf or boogie board, you will get this. What makes it fun is you can ride all the waves. Even the small waves, I was going all the way to chest in sand at the shore. Cool thing, I will always have this at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit for the price but mine had a small rip in the bottom right corner. I should have unwrapped it right away instead of throwing in my trunk and waiting for the right beach day which came beyond the return and replace 30 day time. It's light and stays well on my hand. Fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ingham

customer_reviews.title: Here's the break down
customer_reviews.text: I took this to Ocean City, Maryland over my vacation to where the waves are any where from waist high to shoulder high on a 5'10 male. And it was pretty solid with the waves on the smaller side it was ok on the bigger ones but had a rough landing. I would pick this over a boogie board 9 times out of 10 just because of the lightweight and compact design, it was so easy to catch a wave and then dive right back in to the next one. This board is flawless the design is sleek and the feel of the board is great. I recommend this board to beginners all the way up to the pros. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Southern Pride

customer_reviews.title: 2nd board ordered
customer_reviews.text: These are quality body surfing boards. In fact, this is the second one we have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Henning

customer_reviews.title: Awesome board
customer_reviews.text: Fun and easy to use. My husband use it to body surf, our toddler uses it like a kick-board. Great color, functional, and durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Bogus

customer_reviews.title: Go with a Wedge instead
customer_reviews.text: This is more toy-like than a real handboard. I own two others from the same company and love them both. This entry-level unit is a weak offering.
customer_reviews.author: Everyons Uncle Ed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!!! My son loved his birthday present and the item has a social media following
customer_reviews.author: Chula, SD

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn’t be listed with boogie boards as it’s more a “ hand” board
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected very small hand boards. They are not for your body would not buy sgain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They are a piece of foam. They should be selling this in dollar store. Would not recommend it for that price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He and I would certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to 14 year old grandson. Having not seen one before and questioning if it was a very large single flipflop, he was excited to give it a try. Has turned into a big hit. He and I would certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RMacR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for both kids and adults! Well constructed! Fun times at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Great At Catching Waves. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in the ocean. No problem catching waves. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: Instant hit!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought three of these for my kids& self. Now,I think I should go for some fins! If there is enough surf, the grom is easy to catch waves with, but for waves that flatten out and turn into slop, you need a little more to keep you going. I am a strong swimmer, but sometimes the waves lose power around here and you need a bit more for a longer ride. When the surf is really pulling, you can't go wrong with these guys!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any day at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I currently have the Wedge, Bula, and now Grom Handboards from Slyde. As a big fan of Slyde, I was sure the quality and value would be in abundance. It turns out Slyde did not disappoint. Had a fun first day with the Grom and to my disappointment my neighbors dog got in my yard and found it on a shelf the next day. Dogs love the Grom as well. I immediately ordered another to replace the damaged one. I highly recommend any product from Slyde, it is mandatory when going to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: TheBaldCarGuy

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for our whole family, our four year old and even grandpa loves it! And with beach gear for four kids, the size of these boards makes it oh so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M Law

customer_reviews.title: Worst product . i hope it disapiers forever
customer_reviews.text: The absolute worst fun and time in the water with this shark tank pc of crap way to expensive for how its constructed. Tom Morey is a guru not these folk sorry . in Morro Bay locals all hate the thing . worst hype and a very greedy product. A pair of Churchill fins is 120% more fun without this junk
customer_reviews.author: blacktron

customer_reviews.title: a copy of the original hand surfer  HANDGUN  by Churchill Swim Fibs
customer_reviews.text: The original hand surfer came out in 1979 thousands were sold advertised on TV in Honolulu by SEARS sold retail for $19 even shape was copied
customer_reviews.author: jerry johnson

customer_reviews.title: The Grom / My fav
customer_reviews.text: Taking this out in San Clemente for the longer rides/corners is a blast. Even with larger sets rolling in, the Grom makes is smooth in higher speeds. You gotta put this in your arsenal for beach going. Simple, easy to use and easy to pack up for the long beach walks back to the car. Thank you Slyde!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super stoked....
customer_reviews.text: Slyde Grom....just got my new Grom recently, super excited to surf the waves....unfortunately is way too cold in the East Coast, but come early April I will be ready...I am impressed with the quality and the crazy light weight of the board...also have the shoulder bag which is the perfect way to pack and carry my GROM....Cheers to Slyde, fast shipping and great communication.
customer_reviews.author: PAS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to pack!
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the whole family! Easy to pack and very easy to use! My boys are happy that mom is finally getting out into the water with them too! Love how buoyant it is! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: OCsunandsand

customer_reviews.title: A Blast for the Kids!
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was unbelievably superb when I had a problem with shipping! The board was for a 12 year old’s birthday, and he and all his friends are having a blast with it. I’m glad there's an entry level board now whose price is more consumer/kid friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Barry S.

customer_reviews.title: Instantly broke
customer_reviews.text: Plastic clip broke after taking it out of the box and trying it on gor the first time. Sad to say i sidnt even get it in the water... not wirth 59.99.......
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to take my Wedge out in decent surf... HOLY S***! Fast! Awesome! So much fun. Like I said I've been bodyboarding for 30 years and THIS might take it's place. Totally stoked! Thank you for creating an amazing product. Product sounds s***ty... it's more than a product. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor, get one!
customer_reviews.text: Best handboard I've ever used. Durable construction, and the extra size really let's you make it out of barrel sections! Stoked on my handboard
customer_reviews.author: William Cole

customer_reviews.title: my son and his friends use it all day very good
customer_reviews.text: buy it for me and now I have difficulty using it, my son and his friends use it all day very good performance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shacktown population you bro!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Slyde handplane. It has allowed me to take my bodysurfing to the next level! Great product never had signal issue with it. Slyde on my friends!!!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer McGrath

product_meta.title: As Seen On Shark Tank! The Slyde Grom Soft Top Body Surfing Handboard/Handplane, Easy to Use, Fun to Master, Safe for for All Ages, Portable, Light Weight, Durable with Exceptional Buoyancy
feature_bullets: 🌊 THE MOST FUN YOU'LL HAVE IN THE WATER - At 19in x 10in the Slyde handboard Grom is the ultimate starter body surfing hand plane that will turn your bodysurfing session into the time of your life. With super advanced construction, this handboard has an ultra-buoyant foam core and an extra soft and sticky grip top skin with a buttery slick bottom that will have you Slyding down any wave like a pro, no matter your skill level.

😃 EASY TO USE – “The perfect surfer starter kit” says MARK CUBAN. The Slyde Grom soft top body surfing hand plane / handboard is really easy to learn. We spent over a year perfecting the design, manufacturing and materials. Making it a great board for the beginner handboard rider but also a great board to whomp with in shorebreak for the pro watermen and woman

FUN TO MASTER – ”The perfect blend of soft foam and functional hand plane shape making an excellent fun handboard. Something that I’m not worried will take out a tooth, but can give a big boost of lift and speed. Great for getting barrels" Sean Enoka – Pro Hawaiian handboarder.

💓 SAFE FOR ALLL AGES - We call it bump friendly the outer foam layer makes for a durable yet perfectly soft outer layer that is super safe for ALL AGES in all sorts of wave conditions. SLYDE IS A FAMILY OWNED AND RUN. SLYDE IS THE BEST QUALITY HANDBOARD IN THE INDUSTRY SINCE 2010 - Based in San Clemente, California. Slyde Handboards manufacturing process is the most advanced in the handboard industry using only the best materials that will last you a lifetime of fun!

✔️ PORTABLE AND LIGHT WEIGHT – The Grom body surfing handboard will fit easily into most backpacks. At just 19in / 48cm long and weighs 9 oz / 255gm , compare the size to other Wave riding equipment the Slyde Grom Handboard is the most travel friendly and easy to carry wave riding tool on the market – DON’T BE A PACK MULE, TRAVEL LIGHT!
